title: Display Advertising Campaign Package
description: Adobe Advertising Cloud DSP Campaign Package Details.

xdm:packageStartTime.title: Package Start Time
xdm:packageStartTime.description: The starting time of serving ads in placements linked to the campaign belonging to this package.

xdm:packageEndTime.title: Package End Time
xdm:packageEndTime.description: The end time of serving ads in placements linked to the campaign belonging to this package.
